channel.title: Andreessen Horowitz
channel.description: News and insights from Andreessen Horowitz

item.title: How Big Bank Fees Could Kill Fintech Competition (July 2025 Fintech Newsletter)
item.description: “Many banks have hostages, not customers.” Reviving the fight over data access, new M&A deals, and more in our July Fintech newsletter.
item.content:encoded: “Many banks have hostages, not customers.” Reviving the fight over data access, new M&A deals, and more in our July Fintech newsletter.

item.title: @a16z
item.description:
The teams building the future of media are building on fal.
They just raised a $125M Series C to scale their real-time generative content platform.
fal is becoming the default infrastructure for get...
